short_summary: Housekeeping services for correctional facilities in Quebec, Canada.
description: This procurement is a request for standing offers to provide housekeeping services to the correctional facilities in the Quebec region of Canada. The statutory cleaning services include housekeeping services such as cleaning of floors, dusting of surfaces, trash removal, disinfection, and other general cleaning tasks. The cleaning services will be performed as requested and as described in the requirement of the contracting facility. The contractor will place personelle on site as required to ensure continuity of service during downtime. The Contractor should provide all of the necessary cleaning supplies and personnel to effectively deliver the cleaning services within the contracted facilities. CSC will be providing the appropriate cleaning equipment, in addition to the annual maintenance of the equipment. The goal of this contract is to ensure the safety of patients, staff, partners, and the public. \\

full_summary:
### Cleaning Services – Care Centres

#### Request for Standing Offer

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is inviting suppliers to submit a bid for the provision of Cleaning Services – Care Centres.

#### Submission Details

* Solicitation Number: 21301-23-4532500
* Publication Date: 2023-12-13
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-17T14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2024-01-17

#### Tender Details

* Classification: 76111501 - Building cleaning services
* Business Function: Care centred cleaning services
* Trade Agreement: Various (listed below)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada (Quebec Region)
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* Duration: Standing Offer award to February 28, 2025, with an option to renew for two (2) additional one-year periods.

#### Note to Bidders

* Suppliers can download the complete solicitation document and associated documents from the Canada buys / tender opportunities website.
* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
* After contract award, bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process.

#### Requirement Details

* The CSC has an obligation to ensure the safety of patients, staff, partners, and the public.
* The health services mandate is to provide quality and safe health care to offenders in accordance with Accreditation Canada’s Required Organizational Practices (ROP) and Health Canada standards.
* Objective: To provide housekeeping services to penitentiary care centres in the Quebec region on an as-needed basis.
* Deliverables: The Contractor must provide cleaning services for the areas and at the frequency indicated in Annex A – Statement of Work.

#### Evaluation Criteria

* Lowest Price

#### Submission Requirements

* Suppliers must meet the eligibility requirements set out in the solicitation document.
* Suppliers must provide all the required documents and information as stated in the solicitation document.
* Suppliers can submit a bid electronically through the Canada buys / tender opportunities website.

#### Industry Support

* Procurement Assistance Canada (PAC) offers seminars to businesses interested in learning how to sell goods and services to the Government of Canada.
